eheth apata parajaya kirimata siduwu sathurage niyama muhunuwara gana ho sathuragen sidu wu wipath gana liyawune itha suluweni.wasanawata shighrayen amathaka wi yana sathya nam apa lowa kisima ratak muhuna nopa tharam darunuma wu da pulul lesa sanwidhanaya wu da wishala lesa aramudal sahitha wu da wenath ratawalata da siya hasthayan digu kala wuda thrasthawadi sanwidhanayakata erehiwa apa satan kara jayagath bawaya.lowa matha kalaye athdakim lath thrasthawadi ka‡∑≤ra kriyawalata shri lanka janathawata pasugiya 30 wasara kalaye muhunadimata siduwu athara shri lanka janadhipathiwarayeku, hitapu indiya agamathiwarayaku athulu nayakayin da, ugathun saha deshapalanagnyayin da athuluwa lakshayakata adhika jana sankhyawak marumuwata path keruni.eltitieeya kotharam mlechcha sanwidhanayak da kiwahoth anek jana kotaswalata amatharawa owun niyojanaya karanawa ya yi ki shri lankawe demala janathawata da ehi praharayanta goduruwimata sidu wiya.aatha sita bala shri lanka rajaya thrasthawadi kondesi piligatha yuthu ya yi apata ki ayata mata kiwa hakke kumana muhunuwarakin kumana sanyuthiyakin paminiya da thrasthawadin thrasthawadin ma bawaya.
